        abstract java.lang.String binaryDecisionEvaluation(java.lang.Boolean append,
                                        ClassificationMethod classmethod)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Evaluates how many decisions(boundary/no boundary) have been taken correctly.

      • boundaryBasedEvaluation

        abstract java.lang.String boundaryBasedEvaluation(java.lang.Boolean append,
                                       ClassificationMethod classmethod)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Evaluates the boundary positions. A word boundary is seen as correct if it exists at a specified position determined by the original file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • pkEvaluation

        abstract java.lang.String pkEvaluation(java.lang.Boolean append,
                            ClassificationMethod classmethod)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        The Pk Evaluation moves through the original file and the generated file using a window of length k. k is defined as half of the mean manual segmentation length. Penalties are thrown if the windows edges are differing or the segmentations disagree
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on error

      • segmentationEvaluation

        abstract java.lang.String segmentationEvaluation(java.lang.Boolean append,
                                      ClassificationMethod classmethod)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Compares the given result with the original segmentation. Finds out matches among them and produces statistics. A match is a match if the amount of syllables and the word boundares are correct
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on error

      • transliterationEvaluation

        abstract java.lang.String transliterationEvaluation(java.lang.Boolean append,
                                         ClassificationMethod classmethod)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Evaluates the word boundaries of the segmented words. A word boundary is only detected correctly if the beginning border and the ending border were set correctly.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • winPR

        abstract java.lang.String winPR(java.lang.Boolean append,
                     ClassificationMethod classmethod)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Implements teh winPR metric.
        Parameters:
        append - if the metric should be started in append mode
        classmethod - the method to evaluate
        Returns:
        the evaluation String
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • windowDiff

        abstract java.lang.String windowDiff(java.lang.Boolean append,
                          ClassificationMethod classmethod)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        The Pk Evaluation moves through the original file and the generated file using a window of length k. k is defined as half of the mean manual segmentation length. Penalties are thrown if the windows edges are differing or the segmentations disagree
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on error

      • wordBoundaryBasedEvaluation

        abstract java.lang.String wordBoundaryBasedEvaluation(java.lang.Boolean append,
                                           ClassificationMethod classmethod)
                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Compares the given result with the original transliteration. Finds out matches among them and produces statistics.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on error
